pages.text: $(li)The Forgotten is a new variation of the skeleton that can be found in deep underground of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Their bows are tipped with Blindness arrows making you hard to see.$(br)$(li)When you're blinded, they'll charge at you with their sword, switching back to the bow once the effect ends.
$(li)They may drop an $(l:patchouli:armors/forgotten_hat)Forgotten Hat$(/l) on death.
